content: my accountant s scarf by darlene joyce materials 4 skeins of inca alpaca size us 6 knitting needles note this pattern has a 2 stitch i-cord at each edge seeded rib pattern multiple of 4 plus 3 plus 4 for i-cord edge row 1 k5 *p1 k3 repeat from * end slip 2 stitches with the yarn in front row 2 k3 *p1 k3 repeat from * end p1 k1 slip 2 stitches with the yarn in front cast on 51 stitches and work in seeded rib pattern until 4 feet of yarn is left bind off © 2010 mosaic yarn studio ltd please contact us at 847-390-1013 if you would like to use this for anything other than your personal use visit us on the web at mosaicyarnstudio com
